Mild to moderate: No 
antiviral agent. Only 
supportive care. 
Severe: 
HSV conjunctivitis: 
Acyclovir  
• 20 mg/kg/dose IV 
q8h  
AND 
Trifluridine  
• 1% topical eyedrops q 
2-3h 
Or 
Ganciclovir gel 
• 0.15% topical q2-3h 
Adenovirus 
conjunctivitis: 
No specific antiviral 
agent 
CMV conjunctivitis 
(extremely rare): 
• treat underlying 
systemic disease with 
IV ganciclovir

disseminated or CNS
